message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.DB, cs.CL, cs.CY

This paper deals with case-based reasoning (CBR) based on description logics (DLs), which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (AI). Therefore, cs.AI is the most likely sub-category. The paper also presents a formalism for adaptation based on DLs, which involves logical reasoning and inference, making cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with knowledge base revision, which is a topic in databases (cs.DB). The paper also involves natural language processing (NLP) to some extent, as it deals with the description of cases, making cs.CL (Computation and Language) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with the application of DLs in CBR systems, which can be considered as a subfield of cybernetics (cs.CY).
